remarks:
Closure law for addition of complex numbers.  Axiom 4 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory.  This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly, nor should the proven axiom ~ ax-addcl be used later.  Instead, in most cases use ~ addcl .  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.) 

---

 Closure law for addition of complex numbers.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, derived from set theory.  This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly, nor should the proven axiom ~ ax-addcl be used later.  Instead, in most cases use ~ addcl . (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-1995.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: axaddcl $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( A + B ) e. CC ) $.
